title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 119 - Rules And Regulations For The Scheduling, Adjourning And Conduct Of Administrative Hearings Relating To Claims For Refund Of Abandoned Property
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 119 - Rules And Regulations For The Scheduling, Adjourning And Conduct Of Administrative Hearings Relating To Claims For Refund Of Abandoned Property

State Regulations
§ 119.1 - Background
§ 119.2 - Notice of hearings
§ 119.3 - Conduct of hearings
§ 119.4 - Presentation of claimant's case
§ 119.5 - Presentation of the case of the bureau of unclaimed funds
§ 119.6 - Briefs and memoranda of law
§ 119.7 - Adjournment of hearings and scheduling of subsequent hearings
§ 119.8 - Failure of claimant to appear
§ 119.9 - Decision and review

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 119

Statutory authority: Abandoned Property Law, §§1406, 1414; State Finance Law, § 8[14]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
